purpose: Highlight key challenges faced by Black workers
title: Ten key challenges to create opportunities for Black workers

bullets.text: Higher unemployment among Black workers compared with other workers
Geographic mismatches between Black workers and opportunity
Underrepresentation of Black workers in faster-growing, higher-wage industries
Underrepresentation of Black workers in higher-wage jobs
Underrepresentation of Black workers in the most in-demand jobs
The disproportionate impact of technology and future of work trends on Black workers
A double broken rung with lower odds of advancement and higher attrition for frontline and entry-level jobs
Low Black representation in the executive levels
A trust deficit among Black employees toward their company
Lack of managerial sponsorship and allyship for Black employees
